rows.label: tlk45320392_02_msg0001
rows.name:
Much as I'd like to set up this
Divine Beast weapon up for use in
combat as soon as possible...

rows.label: tlk45320392_02_msg0002
rows.name:
As you can see, we're critically
short on manpower, and this thing
is extremely difficult to handle.

rows.label: tlk45320392_02_msg0003
rows.name:
If we could at least get it moving,
just sending it towards enemy lines
would be an effective strategy, but...
